snippet: Mo Yan, the winner of the Nobel Prize for Literature, has seen his celebrity grow as he draws on issues in his homeland for inspiration.
abstract: Richard Bernstein An Appraisal column of work of Mo Yan, winner of Nobel Prize for Literature, much of which focuses on daily lives of ordinary people in China.
lead_paragraph: Mo Yan, the winner of the Nobel Prize for Literature, has seen his celebrity grow as he draws on issues in his homeland for inspiration.

headline.seo: Mo Yan Mines a Deep Well of Material in China
headline.main: In China, a Writer Finds a Deep Well
headline.print_headline: In China, a Writer Finds a Deep Well
